item.railcraft.firestone.empty:
Its energies controlled,
 it could be useful
 if you could recharge it...
item.railcraft.firestone.charged:
Filled with energy,
 you need only exert
 your will on it to
 release blistering heat...
gui.railcraft.locomotive.steam.tips.butt:
Locomotive reduces fuel
 usage, but retains its heat.
 If the train is held by a track,
 it behaves as if Idle.

Shuts off the Locomotive.
 Halts all movement and
 begins the cool-down process.
 This can take some time.
gui.railcraft.locomotive.tips.button.loc:
This cart is locked to
 %s.
 It will only accept Tickets
 issued by them or an operator.
gui.railcraft.locomotive.tips.button.unl:
Click to lock locomotive.
 Once locked, it will
 only accept Tickets
 issued by you or an operator.
gui.railcraft.locomotive.tips.button.pri:
This cart is private to
 %s.
 It can only be controlled
 by them or an operator.
